text: Philippe Dajoux (born 23 March 1968 in Marseille) is a French actor and film director.Philippe Dajoux - Biographie at Allocine == Biography == After training as an actor, he made film clips, short and long features. He has worked in television since 2006, notably making 277 episodes of the series Plus belle la viePlus belle la vie full cast and cres, IMDb"Entre le long- métrage et Plus belle la vie il a gagné 5 millions de spectateurs", Corse Matin, 17 July 2010 and 24 episodes of Seconde Chance."Second Chance" at IMDb == Filmography == * 1997 : Gueules d'amour * 1999 : Les CollèguesJean-Paul Bernard, Les Collègues * 2001 : La Grande Vie ! * 2005 : Une belle histoire * 2006 : Plus belle la vie (TV series) * 2008 : Seconde Chance (TV series) * 2015 : Deux au carré"Un long-métrage en tournage à l'hôtel 3.14 à Cannes", Nice Matin, 2 April 2014 Deux au carré, cinenews.be Cécile Marx, "Deux au carré de Philippe Dajoux", Lesuricate magazine 29 September 2015 ==References== == External links == * * Philippe Dajoux at Allocine Category:French film directors Category:French television directors Category:People from Marseille Category:1968 births Category:Living people
title: Philippe Dajoux
